title: UST Satellite System
purpose: Design a systematic UST trading approach to complement the Flow Strategy, combining trend following with month-end effects
notes:
Highest-importance project. Large and complex - will need its own structure eventually. Ongoing.

[2026-01-22] Current challenge: So many levers to pull, having trouble figuring out where to start and how to confirm that research being done is reliable and accurate. Need to establish a process from idea generation to thoroughly vetted tradable strategy.
